Hi,

I downloaded ksp from steam but when I try to slow down the acceleration of the engines, they dont respond (left control). I just tried to change the control keys in settings and they function with other configurations but when I try to use left ontrol to slow down, it doesnt work. I have the EEUU keyboard configuration in settings and everything is predeterminated. How could I change it? Thanks
Which OS are you running?  Not sure if it affects the left Ctrl key as well, but I think Linux affects some keys.
I just use Linux, but it detects perfectly all the keys so I guess the problem is caused by the game. But thanks, I think KSP in Linux doesnt work as well as other SO (sad :( ).

I don't think it is an unbeatable problem, should be possible to remap your keys within the game settings.  If all else fails, you can even directly edit your Setting.cfg file (in the main game directory)
